mapper.select: SELECT rn, QNA_SEQ ,STORE_SEQ ,USER_ID ,QNA_TITLE,QNA_CONTENT ,QNA_ANSWER,QNA_HIDE ,QNA_READ ,QNA_REGDATE ,QNA_DELFLAG FROM (SELECT rownum AS rn, QNA_SEQ ,STORE_SEQ ,USER_ID ,QNA_TITLE,QNA_CONTENT ,QNA_ANSWER,QNA_HIDE ,QNA_READ ,QNA_REGDATE ,QNA_DELFLAG FROM CON_QNA WHERE QNA_DELFLAG='N') WHERE CEIL(rn/5)=#{pnum} AND USER_ID =#{user_id}

SELECT rn QNA_SEQ ,STORE_SEQ ,USER_ID ,QNA_TITLE ,QNA_CONTENT ,QNA_ANSWER ,QNA_HIDE ,QNA_READ ,QNA_REGDATE ,QNA_DELFLAG FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()over(ORDER BY QNA_REGDATE DESC) AS rn ,QNA_SEQ ,STORE_SEQ ,USER_ID,QNA_TITLE ,QNA_CONTENT ,QNA_ANSWER ,QNA_HIDE ,QNA_READ ,QNA_REGDATE ,QNA_DELFLAG FROM CON_QNA WHERE STORE_SEQ =#{store_seq}) WHERE CEIL(rn/5)=#{pnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE con_qna SET QNA_DELFLAG ='Y' WHERE qna_seq=#{qna_seq}
